bibl.title: PTebt 703 and the Genre of 1 Timothy: The Curious Career of a Ptolemaic Papyrus in Pauline Scholarship.
bibl.note: I. Discovery and Initial Publication [of. P. Tebt. III, 703]. - II. Analysis and Translation. - III. P. Tebt. III, 703 in New Testament Scholarship. - Conclusion.
MITCHELL Margaret M., PTebt 703 and the Genre of 1 Timothy: The Curious Career of a Ptolemaic Papyrus in Pauline Scholarship.
